overview.name: Suhith Ghanathay
overview.title: Full Stack Developer & AI Engineer
description: Experienced Full Stack Developer with 4+ years in the software industry, currently pursuing MS in Computer Science at UT Arlington with a focus on Intelligent Systems and Software Engineering.

My expertise spans modern web technologies, mobile development, and AI/ML, with a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development. I specialize in building scalable applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js, while leveraging AI/ML technologies to create intelligent solutions.

In my previous role at Capgemini, I significantly improved system performance and automated testing workflows, demonstrating my commitment to delivering high-quality software solutions. My current focus includes developing AI-powered applications and exploring innovative ways to integrate machine learning into web and mobile platforms.
